about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Salome's Kiss, including:

  • Three uncensored sex scenes
  • Three new CGs
  • About 6,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Salome's Kiss, to download.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC adds three uncensored lesbian sex scenes in the story, which are scattered through the story.

detailed_description:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Salome's Kiss, including:

  • Three uncensored sex scenes
  • Three new CGs
  • About 6,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Salome's Kiss, to download.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

name: Salome's Kiss Adult Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win XP+
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output
